field.label: Certificate Name
field.helptext: This Certificate is used to sign requests to Skuid's Cloud Data Service and/or a Private Data Service.

action.label: Page dependency records exist for this datasource

skuid__text.contents: This data source is referenced by one or more pages. You must remove the data source from the page(s) before it can be deleted.
The following app(s) contain this data source as a resource:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this data source? You can't undo this.

action.label: Rows exist in warden for this data source

skuid__text.contents: You haven't created a data source yet.
Data sources  are the individual connections between Skuid and a specific service. When needed, they use authentication providers to connect to a service.

action.label: if AP is being used by data sources, don't let users delete it

skuid__text.contents: This authentication provider is being used in one or more data sources. You must remove it from the data sources before continuing to deletion
Data source(s) using this authentication provider:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this authentication provider? You can't undo this.
You haven't created an authentication provider yet.
Authentication providers contain information and configurations—credential settings, request headers, etc.—used to authenticate to an external service.

actionsequence.label: Goto Datasource Detail
actionsequence.description: Choose whether Warden or Pliny DS and go to the right URL

skuid__text.contents: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this data service? You can't undo this.
